prompt_results.prompt_text: Turn on the Office WLED every day at 7:00 AM

alias: Turn On Office WLED at 7 AM
description: "Turn on the Office WLED every day at 7:00 AM"
mode: single

conditions: []
action:

prompt_results.prompt_text: Every 15 mins choose a random effect on the Office WLED device. Play the effect for 15 secs. Choose random effect, random colors and brightness to 100%. At the end of the 15 sec the WLED light needs to return to exactly what it was before it started.
prompt_results.automation_yaml:
id: office_wled_random_effect_every_15
alias: Office WLED – random 15s burst every 15 min
description: "Every 15 minutes, run a 15-second random full-brightness effect on Office WLED, then restore its previous state."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time_pattern
    minutes: "/15"
conditions: []
action:
  - service: scene.create
    data:
      scene_id: office_wled_before_random
      snapshot_entities:
        - light.wled
  - variables:
      random_r: "{{ range(0, 256) | random }}"
      random_g: "{{ range(0, 256) | random }}"
      random_b: "{{ range(0, 256) | random }}"
      effects:
        - "Solid"
        - "Blink"
        - "Breathe"
        - "Color Wipe"
        - "Rainbow"
      random_effect: "{{ effects | random }}"
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness: 255
      rgb_color:
        - "{{ random_r }}"
        - "{{ random_g }}"
        - "{{ random_b }}"
      effect: "{{ random_effect }}"
  - delay: "00:00:15"
  - service: scene.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: scene.office_wled_before_random

prompt_results.automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_living_room_scene_restore'
alias: Office WLED Living Room 10-Min Scene
description: "When Office WLED turns on, set Living Room to 80% for 10 minutes, then restore Office and turn Living Room off"
mode: restart

    entity_id: light.wled
    from: 'off'
    to: 'on'

      scene_id: office_wled_before_living_room_scene
      snapshot_entities:
        - light.wled
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 80
  - delay: '00:10:00'
  - service: scene.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: scene.office_wled_before_living_room_scene
  - service: light.turn_off
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2

prompt_results.prompt_text: Check the time. If it's between 6 AM and 9 AM, turn on the Office WLED to 50% with a warm white color and turn off all living room lights. If it's between 5 PM and 8 PM, turn on all living room lights to 80% and set the Office WLED to 100% with a cool white color. If it's after 9 PM, turn on the Office WLED to 20% brightness and turn off all living room lights. Wait 5 seconds after any action.
prompt_results.automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_living_room_time_routine'
alias: Office WLED and Living Room Time Routine
description: "Time-based Office WLED and Living Room light routine with 5-second delay after actions"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time_pattern
    minutes: '/1'
conditions: []
action:
  - choose:
      - conditions:
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ now().hour >= 6 and now().hour < 9 }}"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 50
              rgb_color:
                - 255
                - 160
                - 80
          - service: light.turn_off
            target:
              entity_id: light.living_room_2
          - delay: '00:00:05'
      - conditions:
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ now().hour >= 17 and now().hour < 20 }}"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.living_room_2
            data:
              brightness: 204
              rgb_color:
                - 200
                - 220
                - 255
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 100
              rgb_color:
                - 200
                - 220
                - 255
          - delay: '00:00:05'
      - conditions:
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ now().hour >= 21 }}"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 20
              rgb_color:
                - 255
                - 120
                - 40
          - service: light.turn_off
            target:
              entity_id: light.living_room_2
          - delay: '00:00:05'

questions.question_text: Which device did you mean? Device 'lights' matches devices in wrong location. You mentioned: living, office, living_room
Could you clarify: Action 'turn' is vague - missing details: dim, brighten

prompt_results.prompt_text: When any living room light changes state, check the time and the current brightness of the Office WLED. If it's daytime (6 AM to 6 PM) and the Office WLED is below 50%, turn it on to 70%. If it's nighttime (6 PM to 6 AM) and any living room light is above 60%, dim the Office WLED to 30%. If the Office WLED is already at the target brightness, do nothing. Wait 2 seconds between each check and action.
prompt_results.automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_sync_with_living_room_by_time'
alias: Office WLED – Sync Brightness with Living Room by Time
description: "Keep the Office WLED brightness aligned with living room activity and time of day."
mode: restart
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id: light.living_room_2
variables:
  office_brightness: "{{ state_attr('light.wled', 'brightness') | int(0) }}"
  living_brightness: "{{ state_attr('light.living_room_2', 'brightness') | int(0) }}"
  office_day_target: 179
  office_night_target: 77
condition: []
action:
  - delay: "00:00:02"
  - choose:
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "06:00:00"
            before: "18:00:00"
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ states('light.wled') == 'on' and office_brightness > 0 and office_brightness < 128 }}"
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ office_brightness != office_day_target }}"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness: 179
      - conditions:
          - condition: or
            conditions:
              - condition: time
                after: "18:00:00"
                before: "23:59:59"
              - condition: time
                after: "00:00:00"
                before: "06:00:00"
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ states('light.living_room_2') == 'on' and living_brightness > 153 }}"
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ states('light.wled') == 'on' }}"
          - condition: template
            value_template: "{{ office_brightness != office_night_target }}"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness: 77
  - delay: "00:00:02"
